reply.content:

comment: Grande, Pedro!

author: ranzy manzy
comment: Very helpful

author: Ndamu Lelo
comment: Loved iy

author: M
comment: It's interface is clunky as hell and it does the same thing TripAdvisor or Google trips does but worse with a smaller community. Would be useful if you could actually string together a day trip itinerary

reply.author: minube
reply.content:
Hello Jane, we're sorry about your experience.
For us is very important to improve everyday and it'd be great to know what parts of the interface could be better. Please, could you write an e-mail to bea@minube.com in order to let us know your opinion? 
Thank you very much

author: Ichi Lychee
comment: Useful. Would be nice if current weather & temperature conditions were displayed along with the places.

author: John-Nicole Freeman
comment: I tried 3 different emails and it said they already exist. Looks good tho. I will have to Uninstall.

reply.author: minube
reply.content:
Thanks for your comment, John. We're sorry about your experience.

We've found a little bug affecting to the message when the e-mail is incorrect. Could you please check that there are no spaces at the beginning or the end of the mail? If it's not the problem, could you please write to bea@minube.com? 
Thank you very much :)

author: Dave Cormier
comment: I turned off all notifications, and it still gave me notifications. I don't care how good the rest of the app is. Uninstalling.

author: Ana Trujillo Ruiz
comment: I love this application, help me so much to find my perfect tour. 100% recomended and intuitive user interface <3

author: Joel J.
comment: Gives me ideas about where to go

author: collaine mara Castillo
comment: Love it so far!!!  Easy to create travel goals since it has several infos on activities,  food & lodgings in different countries....

author: Gillie Gillie
comment: Seems like a great app. Too bad I can't open anything from the home screen.

reply.author: minube
reply.content:
Hello Gillie!
We're sorry about your experience. We'd like to make sure that we understood your issue: do you mean that, when you pulse in any recommendation nothing happens? Please, respond to bea@minube.com so we can check what's going on.
Thank you very much!

author: Austin Kelly
comment: Great travel app, prefect for finding destinations but would only recommend changing it so you can choose both color, length of stay and type of destination at once it only allows you to pick one 😊😊

comment: I can't find it useful for travelling in India. No hotel suggestions no itnery nothing
title: Not for india

comment: Very nice app, easy to the eye. Problem is, it doesn't work well. Lacks functionality.

reply.author: minube
reply.content:
Hello Ronald!
We're sorry that your experience wasn't positive. Please, could you send us an email to bea@minube.com telling us what part of the app didn't work well? We'd be very very thankful :)

title: Nice concept, but the app leaves you wishing more.

comment: White pages, doesn't work at all

reply.author: minube
reply.content:
Hello!
We're sorry that your experience wasn't positive. We'd love to fix it as soon as possible so we can give you a good experience. Could you, please, send the screenshots of the page where the app has white pages to bea@minube.com? You'd be helping a lot of travelers with that :)
Thank you very much!

author: Izanami A Mizuki
comment: If I try to check mark an item from the front/home page of the app the app freezes up. Once it freezes the only way to close it is to go to my active apps and end it there. It also does this when I try to click on a folder with what looks like a wand on it (this folder is not just on the front page ). And I can't send issue concerns from the app (it just won't send ).

reply.author: minube
reply.content:
Hello Izanami!
We're sorry that your experience wasn't positive. Please, write to bea@minube.com so we can track your issue and try to solve it as soon as possible :)
Thank you very much!

title: Freezing up issue

author: Hussain Saifuddin
comment: Best app ever for travel lover

author: Christopher Heriot
comment: I've not run this app in months, but it keeps popping up with an error message about "someone's pulled the plug". If I want the app to do something, I'll open it.

reply.author: minube
reply.content:
Hello Christopher,
We're sorry about your experience. We'd love to check your issue so, could you please write to bea@minube.com?
Thank you very much!

title: Stop running

author: Donny Christian Paendong
comment: Love it

author: Ankit Mittal
comment: Sure i can explore places with this one but my biggest problem is with the location settings. Despite location services being granted, it still can't upload photos in the album section. I cant share my owm travel photographs in this app which is a big let down

reply.author: minube
reply.content:
Hello Ankit!
We're sorry that your experience wasn't positive.
minube generates the albums of your trips with the geolocated pictures of your phone that are not taken in your hometown... Is it possible that your geolocated pictures are not from your trips? Please, write to bea@minube.com so we can solve your problem as soon as possible. 
Thanks!

title: Sharing travel photos isn't possible

author: Christian Freitas
comment: Muito fácil de usar, me ajudou bastante na minha viagem. O melhor app que já instalei do gênero
title: Simplesmente sensacional

author: J Y
comment: Great quick info on the fly~
title: Excellent

author: Deep Soni
comment: Need an inspiration? That's what the notifications keep asking. Not really but it did inspire me to uninstall this app and leave a frustrated review.

reply.author: minube
reply.content:
Hello Deep!
We're sorry that your experience wasn't positive.
In settings you can disable 3 types of notifications, we hope that in the next update you'll be able to disable all of them.
Please, write to bea@minube.com if you need antything.
Cheers!

title: Annoying notifications every few hours.

comment: I am starting to enjoy it

reply.author: minube
reply.content:
Hello Wipra!
We're sorry that your experience wasn't positive. Please, write to bea@minube.com so we can have more information about the issue and fix it as soon as possible :)

title: Error

author: mary Sulimani
comment: Very nice easy to use

author: Amanda F.
comment: Great app so far.. nice concept and interesting recommendations. My one  criticism would be that the favorites/saved places seem to be only grouped by city. It would be great if they could be first grouped by country (then sub-grouped by city)... this would make the app a much more useful reference for planning trips. ☺

author: Arianna Padilla
comment: Cuando me meto a albumes y dice que tengo qu activar la geo de mi camara y de mi móvil  cuando lo hago dice que hay un erro e intentar mas tarde......y eso causa que no tenga actividad...tambien cuando subo mis fotos y pongo mi opinion aparece en mis rincones y luego se borran y me dice Vaya Este USUARIO NO A SUBIDO ACTIVIDAD y tengo que volver hacer todo nose si este haciendo algo mal o la aplicación sea asi me podrian decir especificamente porfavor que estoy haciendo mal? Gracias

reply.author: minube
reply.content:
¡Hola Arianna!
Lamentamos que tu experiencia no haya sido óptima. Para que se puedan generar tus álbumes es necesario haber tomado las fotos de los viajes con la geo activada, ¿es posible que no lo estuviese? Por favor, escríbenos a bea@minube.com para que podamos responderte punto por punto y ver qué pasa con  tus experiencias subidas.
¡Un saludo!
